files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. Provides functions for searching, counting, and calculating gematrical values in Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a given word in the Quran data. Optionally performs case-sensitive search by iterating over verses and returns those containing the search word.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the Quran verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag to determine if the search should be case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Searches for an exact word group (phrase) in the Quran data with optional case sensitivity and returns verses containing the phrase.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for in the Quran data.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.description: Searches for a word group (phrase) within a specified verse range in the Quran data, with an option for case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.description: The ending verse as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Searches for verses in the Quran data that contain exactly the specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words a verse must have to be included in the result.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Searches for verses in the Quran data where the word count is a multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple for filtering verse word counts. Must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic text by summing the numerical values of its characters based on a predefined mapping.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The Arabic word or phrase for which the gematrical value is to be calculated.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for individual words in the Quran data that match a specified gematrical value and returns details including word, surah number, and ayah number.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for word groups (phrases) in the Quran data that have a specific gematrical value, with optional case sensitivity, and returns matching verses if the computed value matches the target.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match for the word group.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value for all words in a specific Surah in the Quran data.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which to calculate the gematrical value.

functions.name: calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value for verses within a specified overall verse number range in the Quran data.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: start_verse_num
parameters.description: The starting overall verse number (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_verse_num
parameters.description: The ending overall verse number (inclusive).

functions.name: calculate_quran_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value for the entire Quran by summing the gematrical values of all words across its verses.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses. Each dictionary should have a 'verse_text' key.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data and performs various search operations using functions from the quran_search module, then prints the results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It demonstrates functionalities including word search, word group search, verse range queries, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations, with results printed to the console.
